comment.author: 63701599@N08
comment._content: Kenneth Taylor Merritt died when a P-40 landed and skidded off the runway at Rangoon, Burma and slammed into a Chevrolet sedan in which Ken was sitting. He was buried at the British Cemetery in Rangoon. Ken was born 26 Jul 1918 in Texas and his U.S. miliary id number was O-404171
